sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Cart.css" import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function Cart() { const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.products.value) const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState(() => { let s = 0 for (let i = 0; i < cartItems.length; i++) { s += cartItems[i].price } return s }) console.log(cartItems); const placeOrder = () => { } return (

Checkout

Total Items: 0

{cartItems.map((cartItem, index) => (

{cartItem.productName}

Amount: {cartItem.price} DNT

))}

Total Amount

Amount: {totalAmount} DNT

) } export default Cart
